Package pandemicGame

Class Particles

java.lang.Object
pandemicGame.OnscreenObject
pandemicGame.Particles
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnimatedObject
public class Particles
extends OnscreenObject
implements AnimatedObject
This class implements Particles class and defines methods to allow particles to move in the direction of the doctor object and disappear when they get in contact with viruses or maskless people. Doctor objects and maskless people shoot particles.

    • Particles

      public Particles​(AbstractAnimation animation, int x, int y, double degree)
      This method draws the shape of the particles
      Parameters:
      animation - an initialized abstract animation
      x - the x-coordinate of the current location where the particle should be drawn
      y - the y-coordinate of the current location where the particle should be drawn
      degree - the current direction of the Doctor object
